spec_data.Name: texlive-bxdvidriver
spec_data.Description:
This single-function package enables authors to specify a
global driver option (dvips, dvipdfmx, etc) which is applied
only when the engine outputs a DVI file. It is useful to create
special document- templates that can be compiled in both PDF-
mode and DVI-mode.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Sun 06 Aug 2017 08:12:54 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Enables specifying a driver option effective only in DVI output
